TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataFormats extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供 预定义的 格式名称。
使用它们来标识存储在 中的数据的格式。

span.span: Use them to identify the format of data that you store in an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 并类还使用`static`格式列表，以确定系统中检索的数据类型，或拖放操作中转移。The and classes also use the `static` format list to determine the type of data that is retrieved from the system , or that is transferred in a drag-and-drop operation. 方法允许您为：The method allows you to: - 获取一个预定义格式名称或 ID 编号的对象。Get a predefined object for a format name or ID number. - 新格式名称/ID 编号将对添加到`static`列出在此类中，并使用作为 Windows 注册表注册格式设置时将其传递格式名称的格式。Add a new format name/ID number pair to the `static` list in this class, and to register the format with the Windows registry as a format when you pass it the format name. 可以获取数或格式中的相应属性从实例。You can get the number or format from the appropriate property in the instance. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建名为的新数据格式`myFormat`。The following code example creates a new data format named `myFormat`. 该代码随后创建`MyNewObject`并将其存储在。The code then creates a `MyNewObject` which it stores in a . 复制到。The is copied to the . 下一步，从检索和`MyNewObject`恢复。Next, the is retrieved from the and the `MyNewObject` is recovered. 值`MyNewObject`打印在文本框中。The value of the `MyNewObject` is printed in a text box. 此代码需要`textBox1`已创建并放置在窗体上。This code requires that `textBox1` has been created and placed on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic DataFormats Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataFormats Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic DataFormats Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataFormats Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic DataFormats Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataFormats Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Bitmap As String

summary.span: 指定 Windows 位图格式。
此 字段是只读的。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 位图表示计算机图形为在内存中，位数组，这些位表示图像中单个像素的属性。A bitmap represents a computer graphic as an array of bits in memory, and these bits represent the attributes of the individual pixels in an image. 使用此字段接口和类，以指定的数据类型。This field is used by the interface and the class to specify the data type. 在将添加到或实现，将该字段的格式用作和方法。When adding to an or to an implementation of , use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要查看此类型的对象是否存在，请使用此字段为的格式和方法。To see if an object of this type exists, use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要获取此类型的对象，使用此为格式和方法。To get an object of this type, use this as the format for the and methods.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Dib As String

summary.span: 指定 Windows 与设备无关的位图 (DIB) 格式。

span.span: Specifies the Windows device-independent bitmap (DIB) format.

summary.span: 此 字段是只读的。

remarks.format: ## Remarks DIB 是设计用于确保可以加载和显示在另一个应用程序完全它们出现在原始应用程序的方式使用一个应用程序创建的位图图形文件格式。DIB is a file format designed to ensure that bitmapped graphics created using one application can be loaded and displayed in another application exactly the way they appeared in the originating application. 使用此字段接口和类，以指定的数据类型。This field is used by the interface and the class to specify the data type. 在将添加到或实现，将该字段的格式用作和方法。When adding to an or to an implementation of , use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要查看此类型的对象是否存在，请使用此字段为的格式和方法。To see if an object of this type exists, use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要获取此类型的对象，使用此为格式和方法。To get an object of this type, use this as the format for the and methods.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Dif As String

summary.span: 指定 Windows 数据交换格式 (DIF)，Windows 窗体不直接使用此格式。

span.span: Specifies the Windows Data Interchange Format (DIF), which Windows Forms does not directly use.

summary.span: 此 字段是只读的。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 差异是由组成的 ASCII 代码中的数据库、 电子表格中与类似文档可以进行构造以方便使用它们来并将传输到其他程序的格式。DIF is a format consisting of ASCII codes in which database, spreadsheet, and similar documents can be structured to facilitate their use by and transfer to other programs. 使用此字段接口和类，以指定的数据类型。This field is used by the interface and the class to specify the data type. 在将添加到或实现，将该字段的格式用作和方法。When adding to an or to an implementation of , use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要查看此类型的对象是否存在，请使用此字段为的格式和方法。To see if an object of this type exists, use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要获取此类型的对象，使用此为格式和方法。To get an object of this type, use this as the format for the and methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. [!code-cpp[DataFormats_CommaSeparatedValue#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataFormats_CommaSeparatedValue/CPP/dataformats_dif.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DataFormats_CommaSeparatedValue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataFormats_CommaSeparatedValue/CS/dataformats_dif.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataFormats_CommaSeparatedValue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataFormats_CommaSeparatedValue/VB/dataformats_dif.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly EnhancedMetafile As String

summary.span: 指定 Windows 增强型图元文件格式。

span.span: Specifies the Windows enhanced metafile format.

summary.span: 此 字段是只读的。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 图元文件格式是存储方面图形对象而不是像素的图像的 Windows 文件。The metafile format is a Windows file that stores an image in terms of graphic objects rather than pixels. 重设大小时，将图元文件保留图像比位图。When resized, a metafile preserves an image better than a bitmap. > [!NOTE] > 使用剪贴板使用图元文件格式时，可能需要特别注意的事项。Special considerations may be necessary when using the metafile format with the clipboard. 由于中的当前实现的限制使用较旧的图元文件格式的应用程序可能无法识别类，使用.NET Framework 的图元文件格式。Due to a limitation in the current implementation of the class, the metafile format used by the .NET Framework may not be recognized by applications that use an older metafile format. 在这种情况下，您必须进行互操作与 Win32 剪贴板应用程序编程接口 (Api)。In this case, you must interoperate with the Win32 Clipboard application programming interfaces (APIs). 有关详细信息，请参阅 323530，"图元文件上剪贴板是不可见对所有应用程序，"在 Microsoft 知识库文章在http://support.microsoft.com。For more information, see article 323530, "Metafiles on Clipboard Are Not Visible to All Applications," in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at http://support.microsoft.com. 使用此字段接口和类，以指定的数据类型。This field is used by the interface and the class to specify the data type. 在将添加到或实现，将该字段的格式用作和方法。When adding to an or to an implementation of , use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要查看此类型的对象是否存在，请使用此字段为的格式和方法。To see if an object of this type exists, use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要获取此类型的对象，使用此为格式和方法。To get an object of this type, use this as the format for the and methods.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly FileDrop As String

summary.span: 指定 Windows 文件放置格式，Windows 窗体不直接使用此格式。

span.span: Specifies the Windows file drop format, which Windows Forms does not directly use.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此格式可用于在拖放操作期间与 shell 的文件拖动交互。You can use this format to interact with shell file drags during drag-and-drop operations. 使用此字段接口和类，以指定的数据类型。This field is used by the interface and the class to specify the data type. 在将添加到或实现，将该字段的格式用作和方法。When adding to an or to an implementation of , use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要查看此类型的对象是否存在，请使用此字段为的格式和方法。To see if an object of this type exists, use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要获取此类型的对象，使用此为格式和方法。To get an object of this type, use this as the format for the and methods.

summary.span: 返回带有 Windows 剪贴板数字 ID 和名称的 。

span.span: Returns a with the Windows Clipboard numeric ID and name.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats/Format GetFormat(int32 id) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetFormat (id As Integer) As DataFormats.Format

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 为指定的 ID 返回带有 Windows 剪贴板数字 ID 和名称的 。

span.span: Returns a with the Windows Clipboard numeric ID and name for the specified ID.

returns.span: 一个 ，它具有 Windows 剪贴板数字 ID 和格式的名称。

span.span: A that has the Windows Clipboard numeric ID and the name of the format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员通常用于注册本机剪贴板格式。This member is typically used to register native Clipboard formats. 调用当你想要检索一个 ID 号实例，它包含 ID/格式名称对。Call with an ID number when you want to retrieve a instance that contains the ID/format name pair. 通常情况下，由正在使用的应用程序的创建者发布的标识名称和数量与进行交互。Typically, the ID name and number is published by the creator of the application that you are using the to interface with. 例如，在 Visual Basic 中的动态数据交换 (DDE) 会话信息的 ID 号是`&HBF00`，且格式名称将为`vbCFLink`。For example, the ID number for Dynamic Data Exchange (DDE) conversation information in Visual Basic is `&HBF00`, and the format name is `vbCFLink`. 调用此方法与 ID/格式名称将对添加到任何唯一 ID 号`static`的格式名称/ID 对列表中类。Call this method with any unique ID number to add the ID/format name pair to the `static` list of format name/ID pairs in the class. 通过连接"格式"和 ID 号，将创建新的名称。The new name will be created by concatenating "Format" and the ID number. 此对未注册为新格式，因为你未提供一个名称。This pair is not registered as a new format because you have not provided a name. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. [!code-cpp[DataFormats_GetFormat#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataFormats_GetFormat/CPP/dataformats_getformat.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DataFormats_GetFormat#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataFormats_GetFormat/CS/dataformats_getformat.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataFormats_GetFormat#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataFormats_GetFormat/VB/dataformats_getformat.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats/Format GetFormat(string format) cil managed

summary.span: 为指定的格式返回带有 Windows 剪贴板数字 ID 和名称的 。

span.span: Returns a with the Windows Clipboard numeric ID and name for the specified format.

returns.span: 一个 ，它具有 Windows 剪贴板数字 ID 和格式的名称。

span.span: A that has the Windows Clipboard numeric ID and the name of the format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用时需要 Windows 剪贴板数字 ID 的现有格式的格式名。Call with the format name when you need a Windows Clipboard numeric ID for an existing format. 调用此方法使用你自己的格式名称来创建一个新格式类型。Call this method with your own format name to create a new format type. 如果指定的格式不存在，此方法将该名称注册为使用 Windows 注册表的剪贴板格式，并获取格式唯一标识符。If the specified format does not exist, this method will register the name as a Clipboard format with the Windows registry and get a unique format identifier. 此新的名称/ID 对将添加到`static`的格式名称/ID 对列表中类。This new name/ID pair will be added to the `static` list of format name/ID pairs in the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何检索表示格式名称/ID 对。The following code example shows how to retrieve a representing a format name/ID pair. 请求格式，以及检索到的内容显示在文本框中。The format is requested, and the contents of the retrieved are displayed in a text box. 此代码需要`textBox1`已实例化。This code requires `textBox1` has been instantiated. [!code-cpp[Classic DataFormats.GetFormat Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataFormats.GetFormat Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic DataFormats.GetFormat Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataFormats.GetFormat Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic DataFormats.GetFormat Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataFormats.GetFormat Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 注册新的 格式失败。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 图元文件格式是存储方面图形对象而不是像素的图像的 Windows 文件。The metafile format is a Windows file that stores an image in terms of graphic objects rather than pixels. 重设大小时，将图元文件保留图像比位图。When resized, a metafile preserves an image better than a bitmap. > [!NOTE] > 使用剪贴板使用图元文件格式时，可能需要特别注意的事项。Special considerations may be necessary when using the metafile format with the clipboard. 由于中的当前实现的限制使用较旧的图元文件格式的应用程序可能无法识别类，使用.NET Framework 的图元文件格式。Due to a limitation in the current implementation of the class, the metafile format used by the .NET Framework may not be recognized by applications that use an older metafile format. 在这种情况下，您必须进行互操作与 Win32 剪贴板应用程序编程接口 (Api)。In this case, you must interoperate with the Win32 Clipboard application programming interfaces (APIs). 有关详细信息，请参阅 323530，"图元文件上剪贴板是不可见对所有应用程序，"在 Microsoft 知识库文章在http://support.microsoft.com。For more information, see article 323530, "Metafiles on Clipboard Are Not Visible to All Applications," in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at http://support.microsoft.com. 使用此字段接口和类，以指定的数据类型。This field is used by the interface and the class to specify the data type. 在将添加到或实现，将该字段的格式用作和方法。When adding to an or to an implementation of , use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要查看此类型的对象是否存在，请使用此字段为的格式和方法。To see if an object of this type exists, use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要获取此类型的对象，使用此为格式和方法。To get an object of this type, use this as the format for the and methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks RIFF 是广泛的规范，设计用于为不同类型的多媒体文件定义标准格式。RIFF is a broad-based specification, designed to be used in defining standard formats for different types of multimedia files. 使用此字段接口和类，以指定的数据类型。This field is used by the interface and the class to specify the data type. 在将添加到或实现，将该字段的格式用作和方法。When adding to an or to an implementation of , use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要查看此类型的对象是否存在，请使用此字段为的格式和方法。To see if an object of this type exists, use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要获取此类型的对象，使用此为格式和方法。To get an object of this type, use this as the format for the and methods.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Rtf As String

summary.span: 指定由 RTF 数据组成的文本。

span.span: Specifies text consisting of Rich Text Format (RTF) data.

summary.span: 此 字段是只读的。

remarks.format: ## Remarks RTF 是用于传输的文档内容体系结构适应格式的应用程序之间的文本文档。RTF is an adaptation of Document Content Architecture that is used for transferring formatted text documents between applications. 使用此字段接口和类，以指定的数据类型。This field is used by the interface and the class to specify the data type. 在将添加到或实现，将该字段的格式用作和方法。When adding to an or to an implementation of , use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要查看此类型的对象是否存在，请使用此字段为的格式和方法。To see if an object of this type exists, use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要获取此类型的对象，使用此为格式和方法。To get an object of this type, use this as the format for the and methods. RTF 格式的详细信息，请参阅上的 MSDN library 中的丰富文本格式规范http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information about the RTF format, see the Rich Text Format specification in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

summary.span: 此 字段是只读的。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此字段接口和类，以指定的数据类型。This field is used by the interface and the class to specify the data type. 在将添加到或实现，将该字段的格式用作和方法。When adding to an or to an implementation of , use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要查看此类型的对象是否存在，请使用此字段为的格式和方法。To see if an object of this type exists, use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要获取此类型的对象，使用此为格式和方法。To get an object of this type, use this as the format for the and methods. > [!NOTE] > 可序列化格式仅是特定于 Windows 窗体和 Windows 窗体之外创建的应用程序将不会识别。The serializable format is specific to Windows Forms only and will not be recognized by applications created outside of Windows Forms.

span.span: Specifies the Windows Forms string class format, which Windows Forms uses to store string objects.

summary.span: 此 字段是只读的。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此字段接口和类，以指定的数据类型。This field is used by the interface and the class to specify the data type. 在将添加到或实现，将该字段的格式用作和方法。When adding to an or to an implementation of , use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要查看此类型的对象是否存在，请使用此字段为的格式和方法。To see if an object of this type exists, use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要获取此类型的对象，使用此为格式和方法。To get an object of this type, use this as the format for the and methods. > [!NOTE] > 字符串类格式只是特定于 Windows 窗体和 Windows 窗体之外创建的应用程序将不会识别。The string class format is specific to Windows Forms only and will not be recognized by applications created outside of Windows Forms. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. [!code-cpp[DataFormats_StringFormat#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataFormats_StringFormat/CPP/dataformats_stringformat.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DataFormats_StringFormat#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataFormats_StringFormat/CS/dataformats_stringformat.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataFormats_StringFormat#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataFormats_StringFormat/VB/dataformats_stringformat.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly SymbolicLink As String

summary.span: 指定 Windows 符号链接格式，Windows 窗体不直接使用此格式。

span.span: Specifies the Windows symbolic link format, which Windows Forms does not directly use.

summary.span: 此 字段是只读的。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 符号链接是所发生的一个文件的目录条目、 但实际上对不同目录中的文件的引用的磁盘目录条目。A symbolic link is a disk directory entry that takes the place of a directory entry for a file, but is actually a reference to a file in a different directory. 符号链接也称为别名、 快捷方式、 软链接或符号链接。A symbolic link is also called an alias, shortcut, soft link, or symlink. 使用此字段接口和类，以指定的数据类型。This field is used by the interface and the class to specify the data type. 在将添加到或实现，将该字段的格式用作和方法。When adding to an or to an implementation of , use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要查看此类型的对象是否存在，请使用此字段为的格式和方法。To see if an object of this type exists, use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要获取此类型的对象，使用此为格式和方法。To get an object of this type, use this as the format for the and methods.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Tiff As String

summary.span: 指定标记图像文件格式 (TIFF)，Windows 窗体不直接使用此格式。

span.span: Specifies the Tagged Image File Format (TIFF), which Windows Forms does not directly use.

summary.span: 此 字段是只读的。

remarks.format: ## Remarks TIFF 是常用于扫描、 存储和交换灰度图形图像标准文件格式。TIFF is a standard file format commonly used for scanning, storage, and interchanges of gray-scale graphic images. 使用此字段接口和类，以指定的数据类型。This field is used by the interface and the class to specify the data type. 在将添加到或实现，将该字段的格式用作和方法。When adding to an or to an implementation of , use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要查看此类型的对象是否存在，请使用此字段为的格式和方法。To see if an object of this type exists, use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要获取此类型的对象，使用此为格式和方法。To get an object of this type, use this as the format for the and methods.
